department.dept_long_name: Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences

course.title: Theoretical Seismology
course.description: Theoretical aspects of seismology with strong emphasis on global free-oscillation seismology. Topics include continuum mechanics, equations of motion, linearization, perturbation theory, elasticity & anelasticity, rotation & ellipticity, spheroidal & toroidal modes of the Earth, mode splitting, and multiplet coupling.
course.prerequisites: Applied Mathematics 202 or equivalent, or permission of instructor; EPS 204.
